segments.text: How can I travel by air ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you traveled by air before ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , this is the first time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me tell you . First you must buy a ticket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you must go to the airport .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not Yet . Listen to me . Don't forget to take your ID card with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I board the plane now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you also need a boarding pass .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Now I know how to travel by air .
segments.speaker: S1
